thread.title: Drugs cache discovered in Durban house
thread.title_full: Drugs cache discovered in Durban house | News24

author: news24.com
title: Drugs cache discovered in Durban house
text:
Durban - A police swoop in Phoenix on Wednesday led to the recovery of thousands of mandrax tablets, heroin and guns – as well as the arrest of a man.
Police spokesperson Major Thulani Zwane said the cache of drugs and weapons was discovered during a raid at a house in Everham in Phoenix, north of Durban.
“The Phoenix Police Station Drug Team arrested a 36-year-old male for possession of drugs and unlicensed firearms at Everham,” he said.
“Members followed up on information which led them to a certain house in the area. On their arrival, a search was conducted and 4 780 mandrax tablets, 60 straws of heroin and two unlicensed firearms with seven live rounds of ammunition were recovered.”
